item.rogues.spell_book/rogue.spell_bindi:
Spell Book of Savagers, using quick weapons and skills to strike enemies from the shadows
- Strengths: High mobility and melee attack damage
- Weaknesses: Mediocre defense and limited ranged attacks
- Equipment: Moderately armored
item.rogues.spell_book/warrior.spell_bin:
Spell Book of Legionnaires, using heavy weapons and skills to dominate close combat
- Strengths: Strong melee attacks with good mobility
- Weaknesses: Limited ranged attacks and supportive skills
- Equipment: Heavily armored
